pullRequest.title: Update resource path parameter parsing support to spec version
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose

Add annotation support to resource path parameter
Restrict resource-path-rest-param to the last parameter

Fixes #26953
Approach
N/A
Samples
resource function get foo/[@untainted string i]/bar() { }
resource function get foo/bar/[@untainted string... x]() { }
Remarks
Replaced token kind RESOURCE_PATH_PARAM with  RESOURCE_PATH_SEGMENT_PARAM and  RESOURCE_PATH_REST_PARAM
Check List

 Read the Contributing Guide
 Updated Change Log
 Checked Tooling Support (#)
 Added necessary tests

 Parser Unit Tests
 Spec Conformance Tests
 Integration Tests
 Ballerina By Example Tests


 Increased Test Coverage
 Added necessary documentation

 API documentation
 Module documentation in Module.md files
 Ballerina By Examples

commit.message: Add annotation support to resource path parameter
Restrict resource-path-rest-param to be last param

nodes.bodyText:
how about something like
rest parameter must be the last segment of resource path
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -277,3 +277,5 @@ error.invalid.whitespace.in.slash.lt.token=invalid whitespace in ''\\<''
 error.local.type.definition.not.allowed=local type definition not allowed
 error.type.inclusion.in.object.constructor=type inclusions are not allowed in object constructor
 error.version.in.import.declaration.no.longer.supported=version in import declaration no longer supported
+error.resource.path.rest.param.followed.by.resource.path.segment=\
+  resource path rest parameter followed by resource path segment

commit.message: Change resource path rest param syntax error message
